Hi, Iâ€™m Will. I love helping people.

Passionate about improving my local, national, and worldwide communities, I believe that today's new communications technologies show unrealized potential in improving public debate, education, and healthcare delivery. I seek to move policies into practice with compassion and care, moving good ideas into wise practice. That work began as an Implementer at Epic in Verona WI and continues at 18F in Washington DC.

I am currently serving a term appointment at 18F, a digital design and technology agency within the U.S. government.

Outside of work, I spend a lot of time singing, reading, and ideating on how technology will impact our lives in the future.
